response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe the value of this product exceeds $800,000 to us. We are offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exclusive offer is designed to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional opportunity.", "product_price": 750000}
